title: Reviewing Navigant Consulting (NCI) and Booz Allen Hamilton (BAH)
content: Navigant Consulting (NYSE: NCI) and Booz Allen Hamilton (NYSE:BAH) are both business services companies, but which is the superior business? We will compare the two companies based on the strength of their profitability, valuation, institutional ownership, dividends, analyst recommendations, risk and earnings.
